tags: None
review: We are very grateful to Dr Lingaraj as he took very good care of our preemie twins in NICU who were in critical condition. We know him since 6 years. He is very patient and gives very good guidance. It is very rare to see such doctors.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Gave lot of information regarding cold and cough. Gave some advice how to help the child in recovering and also to avoid cold and cough in future

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We found Dr. Lingaraj and his clinic via Practo, and visited him when our 3 year old child was burning with fever for over 5 days, and we were not satisfied with our then current paediatrician. Dr. Lingaraj was able to diagnose the problem quickly (within minutes of seeing her), and explained the problem in detail that completely allayed our fears. His prescription worked wonders, and within a couple of days, our child was back to normal. After a couple of more follow up visits, * *** ****** *** **** ** ** *** **** ************* ** **** ********** His clinic is clean and well sanitised, and we absolutely appreciate his patience when dealing with toddlers and their worried parents. Was very supportive and understanding. We are thankful to him, and definitely recommend him!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre-Term Growth & Development ,Neonatology -preterm follow up,Neonatal Nursing,
review: I would strongly recommend him as my kid was premature and under weight, he has given a proper treatment and taken a very good care of my child. He and his team has encouraged when ever we would fall short on having faith that our kid would come to a normal state and today our kid is fine because of the best treatment given by them. Thanks to Lingraj sir, Manisha mam, Ambada sir and all the sisters (Girija, Jhansi, Pavithra, Ramya, Nirmala, Ranya and Punya) who took care of my kid day and night....

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had never even heard of any pediatrician who treats every child as his own child. He is so reasonable , understanding and always available. Vaidyo narayano harihi comes out true with the case of Dr.Lingaraj. every child needs a Doc like him is what I feel. A million thanks to him for always being there for my daughter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Lingaraj has been my daughter's paediatrician for over two years now. ** ** ****** *** ** *** **** ************* ** *** ********* He is polite and patient, especially with us asking a lot of questions. He understands the parents'mindset and explains accordingly. I would happily recommend him to anyone looking for a good pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
First of all I heartily thanks to Dr.Lingaraj Sir for giving my happiness back to my hand. where I had a pre term baby got delivered  on 14th Dec 2021 33 weeks born with weight of 1.900
Through is staff support he provided with required treatment at NICU and I really appreciate his way of communicating with his patients.I recommend to my known persons to consult Dr.Lingaraj Sir for related to any baby issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We do not recommend this doctor. We visited this doctor for newborn regular checkup. **** ** ***** ********* **** *** he examined and said many issues and asked to go for NICU admission. With doubts  We  consult another senior doctor. **** ****** ******* *** **** *** **** **** ** ***** ********* **** *** ***** ** ** **** *** *********** *** **** **** ** ********* ******** Please think twice before visit this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very good in treatment n explanation. My 8year old baby have cough problem so I choose this dr for a treatment n he did best work. Nice suggestion after treatment like what to eat or not for as per child so consult with only Dr. Lingaraj. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our new born twin babies who were preterm were at Ovum NICU. He was there throughout day and night monitoring the babies which made us feel comfortable that our new borns were under good care. He would give us counseling daily providing updates about the babies progress even after his duty hours. He is always available on phone whenever we have queries. He is very friendly. We were very happy with the care that our babies received at NICU.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** One of the nicest doctor I have ever seen.. I highly recommend one of the nice hospital with good ambience..  as per my experience I saw many more hospital all are completely commercia l. But Ovam is not like that... Thanks Ovam and Thanks Dr. Lingaraj Ji
